workflow_runs.name: firmwareBuild
workflow_runs.display_title: changed the strategy on how to deal with old versions. Now, the versiâ€¦

head_commit.message:
changed the strategy on how to deal with old versions. Now, the version.json will contain a history array that holds old builds. The manage_version.py has been changed to create and manage that.
I've also removed all the github-pages references as we're not publishing to pages but to lightinator.de

head_repository.name: esp_rgbww_firmware
head_repository.description: Firmware for esp_rgbww_controller (https://github.com/patrickjahns/esp_rgbww_controller) based on Sming framework

head_commit.message:
First steps to implement animation handling from the frontend.
- extended the schema so animations can be stored
- put some extra debugging into webserver and application to monitor free HEAP
- extended the maximum size of an incoming multy-command request too 400 bytes to accomodate at least two color commands per request on ESP8266. This can be made larger on the ESP32 based controllers, but the 8266 with it's limited RAM is really the issue here. I will need to troubleshoot memory useage more as I have seen the system run out of memory on longer running animations.
